channel.title: The Sleepy Bookshelf
channel.description:
Fall asleep to classic works of fiction, adapted and narrated to help you rest peacefully. Each episode begins with a brief moment of relaxation followed by a quick summary of the prior episode. That way, you can fall asleep whenever you're ready and always stay caught up.
Become a premium member for access to bonus episodes and ad free listening.
channel.author: Slumber Studios
channel.itunes:author: Slumber Studios

item.title: The Time Machine, Part 1 of 6
item.description:
Tonight, Elizabeth reads Chapters 1-3 of "The Time Machine" by H.G. Wells, first published in 1895.


Try The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepybookshelf.supercast.com/.

Are you loving The Sleepy Bookshelf? Show your support by giving us a review on Apple Podcasts.

Follow the show on Apple Podcasts and Spotify.

Vote on upcoming books via the Survey on our website: https://sleepybookshelf.com.

Connect: Twitter - Instagram - Facebook

Thank you so much for joining us here at The Sleepy Bookshelf. Now, let’s open our book for this evening. Sweet dreams 🥱 😴

item.title: Announcing: The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium
item.description:
Elizabeth explains the brand new premium offering for The Sleepy Bookshelf. 

By signing up, you'll enjoy all of our sleepy episodes completely ad-free and get exclusive access to bonus episodes in between longer books. The first premium episodes will come this weekend (December 11 & 12), so sign up now! We return to our next free book on Tuesday (December 14).

Try The Sleepy Bookshelf Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepybookshelf.supercast.com/.  Or sign up directly within Apple Podcasts to get premium access to The Sleepy Bookshelf and the other sleep-inducing podcasts from Slumber Studios, including Get Sleepy and Deep Sleep Sounds.

Thank you so much for your support of the show. Sweet dreams 🥱 😴
